    • Uses of HttpRequest in com.stormpath.sdk.api

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.api with parameters of type HttpRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApiAuthenticationResult ApiRequestAuthenticator.authenticate(HttpRequest httpRequest)
      Authenticates an HTTP request submitted to your application's API, returning a result that reflects the successfully authenticated Account that made the request and the ApiKey used to authenticate the request.

    • Uses of HttpRequest in com.stormpath.sdk.http

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HttpRequest HttpRequestBuilder.build()
      Returns a new HttpRequest instance reflecting the current builder state.

    • Uses of HttpRequest in com.stormpath.sdk.oauth

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.oauth with parameters of type HttpRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OAuthAuthenticationResult ResourceRequestAuthenticator.authenticate(HttpRequest httpRequest)
      Authenticates an OAuth-based HTTP request using a bearer Access Token and returns the corresponding result.
      OAuthAuthenticationResult OAuthApiRequestAuthenticator.authenticate(HttpRequest httpRequest)
      Authenticates an OAuth-based HTTP request submitted to your application's API, returning a result that reflects the successfully authenticated Account that made the request and the ApiKey used to authenticate the request.
      AccessTokenResult AccessTokenRequestAuthenticator.authenticate(HttpRequest httpRequest)
      Authenticates an OAuth-based HTTP request submitted to your application's API, returning the result of the authentication attempt.
